cards.title: Actionable Deliverables

signals.title: Intelligence starts with a Signal.
signals.subtitle: A verified event that changes the state of the art. We track thousands, but you only see what matters.

examples.title: Competitive Move
examples.description: Verifiable competitive movement: rival launch, market entry/exit, offensive pricing, or repositioning. Impacts dynamics and customer choices.

examples.title: Pricing / Packaging
examples.description: Changes in prices, plans, billing metrics, quotas, or bundling. Directly affects costs and economic viability of scaling.

examples.title: Feature Launch
examples.description: New capability (GA/Beta) that changes how a process is performed. Reported only when there is verifiable delivery and scope.

examples.title: Regulatory Change
examples.description: Shift in regulation, official guidance, or legal criteria. Modifies obligations, permissions, limits, or compliance requirements.

workflow.title: A workflow engineered for SotA decision-making.
workflow.description: From signal detection to rollout, SotA keeps your organisation aligned on the art that matters. Each release travels through our live pipeline so you can trust the output.
